snippet: Mr. Simmons left ESPN acrimoniously last year and his website there, Grantland, was discontinued. The new site is expected to debut by summer.
abstract: Sports personality Bill Simmons, who left ESPN and Grantland website he founded in 2015, says his new website, the Ringer, will debut by spring or early summer.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Simmons left ESPN acrimoniously last year and his website there, Grantland, was discontinued. The new site is expected to debut by summer.

headline.main: Bill Simmons Names His New Website the Ringer
headline.print_headline: Simmons Announces Plans for Post-Grantland Website
